items.postText: Himelified: "All Fizz is doing bowling within his ability, varying his pace & according to his field. Why cant other bowlers do the same?"

items.postText: Duffman: "This is Guppy's 50th 50+ score in ODIs!"

items.text: length and angled in at off stump. Blocked on the front foot
items.postText: Jobaer: "No. 1 problem in BD cricket is MBM. He doesn't have the sharp penetrative power required for making breakthroughs. He should rather focus on his new job in BD parliament rather than wasting a crucial spot in the national duty. He has served a long time and he deserves respect but emotion should not have any place in national team selection. A heartbroken BD fan from the US"
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williamson, no run

items.text: length at off stump, defended off the back foot

items.postText: Srk: "@Jobaer: but who really is pushing Mortaza with their performances from the back ? Really no one"

items.text: length outside off, defended on the back foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, no run

items.text: offcutter at a length outside off, punched to sweeper on the up
items.postText: james: "@Jobaer: Who do you expect to replace Mashrafe as captain for the WC under such short notice? They've lost only 2 matches so far on this tour, and already there are calls for his head. Don't think having any of the other Big 3 as captain, including Shakib, would change the outcome of this series. BD can't expect to win an ODI against a strong outfit at their home, without any form of preparation whatsoever. A few BPL matches don't cut it."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: low full toss just outside off, punched into the turf and bounces over the bowler

items.text: past sweeper who is, once again, a long way in at the boundary. Short of a length and he allows it to come on and cuts late to that fielder's left. He can't stop that being so far inside
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: length and shaping away outside off, pushed to sweeper's right
items.postText: Jinder : "This could possibly be Mashrafe's last world cup anyways, but no one on the team has this much experience and charisma to captain the side apart from maybe Shakib. Once Mashrafe leaves, his presence will be greatly missing in the one day team."
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: appeals for catch behind are turned down and Mashrafe has reviewed it. No appeal from the keeper. Some sporadic ones from in front of the wicket - maybe two or three. Short ball outside off that he was looking to pull. Seemed to have climbed over the outside edge..and there's nothing on HotSpot. Or Snicko. They'll lose the review
